infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs location access to track work routes and ensure driver safety.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track work routes and ensure driver safety.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos of washed vehicles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select vehicle wash photos.
